Articles.Content: Anyone know if having a Fuel train for a refuel operation on Minmus would be a good idea? Like for refueling large ships that landed a bit away from the Mining rig? I usually have a small rover, but i mean Like an interplanetary fuel tank to get refueled (Big orange one). I thought of having several big white ones in a modular system (One tank with doking ports on both ends), but I'm open to ideas.

I've built a fuel truck before that has a grabber claw at one end. On Minmus you can land things with reasonable precision, so it should only be a short run from mining base to a landed ship. Make the core of the truck an orange tank or one of the Kerbodyne tanks if you really wanted to. Certainly easier to handle than a train of several tanks.
